ops_unv_tmplt.script:
#!/opt/universal/python3.6/bin/python3 # -- # Origins: Stonebranch # Author: Ravi Murugesan # Date: 02-Aug-2020 # # Copyright (c) Stonebranch, 2019. All rights reserved. # # Purpose: This Task will create or update an incident in pagerduty in the event # of a Job Failure/long/later runs or any event that can trigger an alert # for the job executing in stonebranch universal controller. # # version = "1.1" # Version History: 0.1 Ravi Murugesan 02-Aug-2020 Initial Version # 1.0 Ravi Murugesan 03-Aug-2020 Baselined after initial review # 1.1 Ravi Murugesan 03-Nov-2020 Add create user and delete user Functionality # # --Import the required modules for execution import argparse, logging, sys, uuid, time, datetime, json, requests # -- loglevel settings INFO,DEBUG, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO, format=' %(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s') # -- Main Logic Function def main(): ScriptSetup() # -- Import Required Modules, Setup Logging Format, Set Variables if args.function == "create_incident": create_incident() elif args.function == "list_incidents": list_incidents() elif args.function == "create_note": create_note() elif args.function == "create_event": create_event() elif args.function == "create_user": create_user() elif args.function == "delete_user": delete_user()
# -- # -- Import Required Modules, Setup Logging Format, Set Variables def ScriptSetup(): parser=argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Purpose : Azure VM operations')
# ## --> Capture Universal Task Form Variables Here parser.add_argument("--function", default="${ops_pd_function}") parser.add_argument("--incident_title", default="${ops_pd_incident_title}") parser.add_argument("--service_id", default="${ops_pd_service_id}") parser.add_argument("--incident_details", default="${ops_pd_incident_details}") parser.add_argument('--urgency', default='${ops_pd_urgency}') parser.add_argument('--conference_number', default='${ops_pd_conference_number}') parser.add_argument('--conference_url', default='${ops_pd_conference_url}') parser.add_argument('--incident_id', default='${ops_pd_incident_id}') parser.add_argument('--incident_notes', default='${ops_pd_incident_notes}') parser.add_argument('--api_token', default="${_credentialPwd('${ops_pd_api_token}')}") parser.add_argument('--from_email', default='${ops_pd_from_email}') parser.add_argument('--incident_key',default='${ops_pd_incident_key}') parser.add_argument('--incident_status',default='${ops_pd_incident_status}') parser.add_argument('--event_action',default='${ops_pd_event_action}') parser.add_argument('--severity',default='${ops_pd_severity}') parser.add_argument('--source',default='${ops_pd_source}') parser.add_argument('--job_type',default='${ops_pd_job_type}') parser.add_argument('--job_status',default='${ops_pd_job_status}') parser.add_argument('--api_url',default='${ops_pd_api_url}') parser.add_argument('--user_id',default='${ops_pd_user_id}') parser.add_argument('--name',default='${ops_pd_name}') parser.add_argument('--email_address',default='${ops_pd_email_address}') parser.add_argument('--job_title',default='${ops_pd_job_title}') parser.add_argument('--role',default='${ops_pd_role}') parser.add_argument('--timezone',default='${ops_pd_timezone}') parser.add_argument('--summary',default='${ops_pd_summary}')
# ## -- global args args = parser.parse_args() # ## --> Logging info parser.add_argument("--logginglevel", default="info") logging.info("Executing version " + version + " with the following paramaters") logging.info(args) # -- # ########################################################################################################################### # This function is to create the incident in pagerduty and if duplicate error on incident creation then a note will be # added to the latest open incident for the job Failure ########################################################################################################################### def create_incident(): logging.info("Pager Duty for Incident creation") # -- Set the request parameters url = args.api_url+'incidents' logging.info("PagerDuty URL: "+url) header={ 'Authorization':'Token token='+args.api_token, 'content-type':'application/json', 'accept':'application/vnd.pagerduty+json;version=2', 'from':args.from_email }
body={ "incident": { "type": "incident", "title": args.incident_title, "service": { "id": args.service_id, "type": "service_reference" }, "urgency": args.urgency, "incident_key": args.incident_key, "body": { "type": "incident_body", "details": args.incident_details }, "conference_bridge": { "conference_number": args.conference_number, "conference_url": args.conference_url } } } logging.info('Message formated to post pagerduty API ') try: logging.info('Attempting to make API call to PagerDuty') response=requests.post(url,data=json.dumps(body),headers=header) format_response=response.json() print(response.text) if (response.status_code != 201): duplicate_key_error=False logging.error("Error in creating the incident in Pagerduty ") for pd_error in format_response['error']['errors']: if "key already exists on this service" in pd_error: duplicate_key_error=True ##if incident already exists with the incident key then fetch the latest incident with that key try: url=args.api_url+'incidents?incident_key='+args.incident_key header={ 'Authorization':'Token token='+args.api_token, 'content-type':'application/json', 'accept':'application/vnd.pagerduty+json;version=2' } logging.info("Checking existing incidents with the same Incident Key") get_incident=requests.get(url,headers=header) if get_incident.status_code == 200: incident_list=get_incident.json() for incident in incident_list['incidents']: incident_number=incident['incident_number'] logging.info("PagerDuty Incident ID :"+str(incident_number)+" notes will be update with latest job failure info") try: url=args.api_url+'incidents/'+str(incident_number)+'/notes' header={ 'Authorization':'Token token='+args.api_token, 'content-type':'application/json', 'accept':'application/vnd.pagerduty+json;version=2', 'from':args.from_email } body={ "note": { "content": args.incident_details } } req_update_notes=requests.post(url,data=json.dumps(body),headers=header) if req_update_notes.status_code == 201: #res_update_notes_format=req_update_notes.json() logging.info("Pager Duty Incident: "+str(incident_number)+" Notes updated successfully") print("Incident: "+str(incident_number)+" Notes Updated") else: logging.error("Error in updating Notes for Incident: "+str(incident_number)) logging.error("API RC: "+str(req_update_notes.status_code)) logging.error("Error Message : "+req_update_notes.text) sys.exit(1) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in Updating Notes for the Incident") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) else: logging.error("Error in Fetching the incident with Incident Key: "+str(args.incident_key)) sys.exit(1) except Exception as e: logging.error ("Error in fetching PagerDuty Incident list") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) if not duplicate_key_error: logging.error("API Call to PagerDuty Failed with RC : "+str(response.status_code)) logging.error("Pager Duty Error Message : "+response.text) sys.exit(1) else: print("*************************************************************") print("Pager Duty Incident Number: "+str(format_response['incident']['incident_number'])) print("Incident Status : "+format_response['incident']['status']) print("First trigger Log entry:"+format_response['incident']['first_trigger_log_entry']['html_url']) print("*************************************************************") logging.info("Response from Pager Duty :"+str(response.text)) except Exception as e: logging.error(" Error Response :"+ response.text) logging.error(e) sys.exit(1)
#*********************************************************************************************************************** #This Function is to list out the alerts thats been sent out for an incident from pagerduty #*********************************************************************************************************************** def create_note(): try: logging.info("Initiating Call to PagerDuty to Update Incident : "+args.incident_id) url=args.api_url+'incidents/'+str(args.incident_id)+'/notes' header={ 'Authorization':'Token token='+args.api_token, 'content-type':'application/json', 'accept':'application/vnd.pagerduty+json;version=2', 'from':args.from_email } body={ "note": { "content": args.incident_notes } } req_update_notes=requests.post(url,data=json.dumps(body),headers=header) if req_update_notes.status_code == 201: #res_update_notes_format=req_update_notes.json() logging.info("PagerDuty Response: "+req_update_notes.text) logging.info("Pager Duty Incident: "+str(args.incident_id)+" Notes updated successfully") print("Incident: "+str(args.incident_id)+" Notes Updated") else: logging.error("Error in updating Notes for Incident: "+str(args.incident_id)) logging.error("API RC: "+str(req_update_notes.status_code)) logging.error("Error Message : "+req_update_notes.text) sys.exit(1) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in Updating Notes for the Incident") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1)
#*********************************************************************************************************************** #This Function will create an User in pagerduty #*********************************************************************************************************************** def create_user(): try: logging.info("Initiating Call to PagerDuty to Create User ") url=args.api_url+'users' header={ 'Authorization':'Token token='+args.api_token, 'content-type':'application/json', 'accept':'application/vnd.pagerduty+json;version=2', 'from':args.from_email } body={ "user": { "id": args.user_id, "summary": args.summary, "type": "user", "name": args.name, "email": args.email_address, "time_zone": args.timezone, "role": args.role, "job_title": args.job_title } } req_create_user=requests.post(url,data=json.dumps(body),headers=header) if req_create_user.status_code == 201: res_create_user_format=req_create_user.json() logging.info("PagerDuty Response: "+req_create_user.text) logging.info("User created in Pagerduty successfully") print("User Details: "+str(res_create_user_format)) else: logging.error("Error Creating User in Pager Duty:") logging.error("API RC: "+str(req_create_user.status_code)) logging.error("Error Message : "+req_create_user.text) sys.exit(1) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in User Creation - PagerDuty") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) #*********************************************************************************************************************** #This Function will delete an user in PagerDuty #*********************************************************************************************************************** def delete_user(): try: logging.info("Initiating Call to PagerDuty ") user_find_url=args.api_url+'/users?query='+args.email_address header={ 'Authorization':'Token token='+args.api_token, 'content-type':'application/json', 'accept':'application/vnd.pagerduty+json;version=2' } queryuser=requests.get(user_find_url,headers=header) queryuser_format=queryuser.json() if queryuser.status_code == 200: pd_user_id=queryuser_format['users'][0]['id'] logging.info("User found in Pagerduty with ID: "+pd_user_id) print("Pagerduty User details :",queryuser.text) logging.info("Initiate Pagerduty to delete user") user_delete_url=args.api_url+'users/'+pd_user_id req_delete_user=requests.delete(user_delete_url,headers=header) if req_delete_user.status_code == 204: logging.info("User Deleted in Pagerduty successfully") print("User: "+args.user_id+" deleted in Pagerduty") else: logging.error("Error Deleting User in Pager Duty:") logging.error("API RC: "+str(req_delete_user.status_code)) logging.error("Error Message : "+req_delete_user.text) sys.exit(1) else: logging.error("Error Retrieving user details in PagerDuty") logging.error("Pagerduty user Search Return code :"+queryuser.status_code) logging.error("Pagerduty Error Response :"+queryuser.text) sys.exit(1) except Exception as e: logging.error("Pager Duty Search response: "+queryuser.text) logging.error("Pager Duty Deletion response: "+req_delete_user.text) logging.error("Error in User Deletion - PagerDuty") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1)
################################################################################################################### #This function will retrieve the list of incidents in pager duty by status ###################################################################################################################
def list_incidents(): logging.info("Initiating Request to PagerDuty") try: url=args.api_url+'incidents?statuses%5B%5D='+args.incident_status+'&service_ids%5B%5D='+args.service_id logging.info("URL : "+url) header={ 'Authorization':'Token token='+args.api_token, 'content-type':'application/json', 'accept':'application/vnd.pagerduty+json;version=2' }
get_incident=requests.get(url,headers=header) if get_incident.status_code == 200: incident_list=get_incident.json() logging.info("API Call to PagerDuty Successful :"+str(get_incident.status_code)) print("************************************************************************************") print("Incident Number , Incident title , Incident Creation_Date, Status") for incident in incident_list['incidents']: print(str(incident['incident_number'])+','+incident['title']+','+incident['created_at']+','+incident['status']) print("************************************************************************************") else: logging.error("Error in Fetching the incident list - API RC: "+str(get_incident.status_code)) logging.error(get_incident.text) sys.exit(1) except Exception as e: logging.error ("Error in fetching PagerDuty Incident list") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1)
####################################################################################################################################### # This function will trigger an event to Pager Duty , So that an Alert will Pager Duty ####################################################################################################################################### def create_event(): try: logging.info("Initiate Request to generate an PagerDuty Event") url=args.api_url header={ 'content-type':'application/json' } body={ "payload": { "summary": args.incident_title, "source": args.source, "severity": args.severity, "component": args.job_type, "class": args.job_status }, "routing_key": args.api_token, "dedup_key": args.incident_key, "event_action": args.event_action } response=requests.post(url,data=json.dumps(body),headers=header) format_response=response.json() if response.status_code == 202: print(format_response['message']+" with "+format_response['status']+"- dedup Key: "+str(format_response['dedup_key'])) logging.info("Event Sent to PagerDuty Successfully") else: logging.error("API RC: "+str(response.status_code)) logging.error("Error triggering event to pager Duty"+str(response.text)) sys.exit(1) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in posting an event to Pagerduty") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1)
# ## --> Functions Go Here # -- # -- Execute main()
ops_unv_tmplt.name: PagerDuty
ops_unv_tmplt.description: task is to create and update pager duty incident for task failures

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: User Role
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: The role of the user e.g: admin
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: role

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Incident ID
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Provide the pager duty incident ID
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: incident_id

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: User Email Address
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: User's Email Address
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: email_address

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Incident Details
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Provide the incidents that needs to be in pager duty
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: incident_details

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: PagerDuty Service ID
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Service ID in pagerduty where the incident needs to be created
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: service_id

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Urgency
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Provide the urgency of the job failure
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: urgency

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Name
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Name of the pagerduty user
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: name

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: PagerDuty API URL
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: For Event creation select : https://events.pagerduty.com/v2/enqueue and other functionality select : https://api.pagerduty.com/
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: api_url

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Event Source System
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: The unique location of the affected system, preferably a hostname or FQDN.
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: source

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Summary
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: specify the incident title or an event summary
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: incident_title

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: PD User Email
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Provide the valid Pager Duty user Email address
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: from_email

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Incident/Dedup Key
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Provide an Incident key for pagerduty incident e.g: Job Name
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: incident_key

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Job Status
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Job status that will fit in to the class field for the pager duty event creation
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: job_status

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Time Zone
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Specify the user Time Zone
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: timezone

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Summary
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Summary about the user creation request
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: summary

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Select Incident Status
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: select the status for which the incident status to be retrieved
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: incident_status

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Conference Number
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Conference Bridge Details for the meeting
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: conference_number

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Event Action
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: provide the appropriate Event Action
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: event_action

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: PD API Token /Routing Key
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Provide the API token for incident and routing key for Event creation
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: api_token

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Conference URL
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: URL for the conference meeting
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: conference_url

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Job Type
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: provide the job type which will fit in the component field of the pager duty event
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: job_type

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Incident Note
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Update the Incident Note
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: incident_notes

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Job Title
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Provide the Job Title of the user
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: job_title

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: PagerDuty Function
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: select the functions that needs to be performed in pagerduty
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: function

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Severity
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: select either one of the status that would be appropriate
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: severity
